ParolBoard.setAll: Set all pixels to same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
ParolBoard.setAllLeftTassel: Set all Left Tassel lights to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
ParolBoard.setAllOuterRing: Set all Outer Ring lights to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
ParolBoard.setAllPetals: Set all Petals to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
ParolBoard.setAllRays: Set all Rays to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
ParolBoard.setAllRightTassel: Set all Right Tassel lights to the same color - INTERNAL USE ONLY
ParolBoard.setBrightness: Set brightness for all LEDs (0-255) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
ParolBoard.setLeftTassel:
Set color of a Left Tassel light (1-2) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Left Tassel mapping: D9 indices [6,7]
ParolBoard.setOuterRing:
Set color of an Outer Ring light (1-10) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Outer Ring mapping: D9 indices [0,1,2,3,4,5,8,9,12,13]
Logical 1-10 maps to physical indices in order
ParolBoard.setPetal:
Set color of a Petal (1-5) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Petals mapping: D7 indices [5,6,7,8,9] → virtual indices [19,20,21,22,23]
ParolBoard.setPixelColor:
Set color of pixel at index (0-23) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Virtual indices: 0-13 = D9, 14-23 = D7
ParolBoard.setRay:
Set color of a Ray (1-5) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Rays mapping: D7 indices [0,1,2,3,4] → virtual indices [14,15,16,17,18]
ParolBoard.setRightTassel:
Set color of a Right Tassel light (1-2) - INTERNAL USE ONLY
Right Tassel mapping: D9 indices [10,11]
ParolBoard.show: Update the LED strip - INTERNAL USE ONLY
input:
Respond to and read data from buttons and sensors.

Events and data from sensors.
parol.allLeftTasselNumbers: Get list of all Left Tassel numbers (1-2)
parol.allOuterRingNumbers: Get list of all Outer Ring numbers (1-10)
parol.allPetalNumbers: Get list of all Petal numbers (1-5)
parol.allRayNumbers: Get list of all Ray numbers (1-5)
parol.allRightTasselNumbers: Get list of all Right Tassel numbers (1-2)
parol.initMotionSensor: Initialize the motion sensor - call this once at the start
parol.isMotionDetected: Check if motion is detected - returns true if someone moved nearby
parol.setAll: Set all pixels to same color
parol.setAllLeftTassel: Set all Left Tassel lights to the same color
parol.setAllOuterRing: Set all Outer Ring lights to the same color
parol.setAllPetals: Set all Petals to the same color
parol.setAllRays: Set all Rays to the same color
parol.setAllRightTassel: Set all Right Tassel lights to the same color
parol.setLeftTassel:
Set color of a Left Tassel light (1-2)
Left Tassel 1 = top, Left Tassel 2 = bottom
parol.setOuterRing:
Set color of an Outer Ring light (1-10)
Outer Ring 1 = first position, Outer Ring 10 = last position
parol.setPetal:
Set color of a Petal (1-5)
Petal 1 = first petal, Petal 5 = last petal
parol.setPixelColor: Set color of pixel at index (0-23)
parol.setRay:
Set color of a Ray (1-5)
Ray 1 = first ray, Ray 5 = last ray
parol.setRightTassel:
Set color of a Right Tassel light (1-2)
Right Tassel 1 = top, Right Tassel 2 = bottom
